definition: not extreme, especially in political views
name: middle-of-the-road

definition: the time of life between youth and old age (e.g., between 40 and 60 years of age)
name: middle age

definition: the period of history between classical antiquity and the Italian Renaissance
name: Middle Ages

definition: of a region of the United States generally including Delaware; Maryland; Virginia; and usually New York; Pennsylvania; New Jersey
name: middle Atlantic

definition: moldboard plow with a double moldboard designed to move dirt to either side of a central furrow
name: middle buster

definition: the note designated by the first ledger line below the treble staff; 261.63 hertz
name: middle C

definition: one of two branches of the internal carotid artery; divides into three branches
name: middle cerebral artery

definition: either of two cerebral veins
name: middle cerebral vein

definition: the social class between the lower and upper classes
name: middle class

definition: the part of a scene between the foreground and the background
name: middle distance

definition: the main cavity of the ear; between the eardrum and the inner ear
name: middle ear

definition: the area around the eastern Mediterranean; from Turkey to northern Africa and eastward to Iran; the site of such ancient civilizations as Phoenicia and Babylon and Egypt and the birthplace of Judaism and Christianity and Islam; had continuous economic and political turmoil in the 20th century
name: Middle East
examples: the Middle East is the cradle of Western civilization

definition: of or relating to or located in the Middle East
name: Middle Eastern

definition: English from about 1100 to 1450
name: Middle English

definition: the second finger; between the index finger and the ring finger
name: middle finger

definition: the Greek language from about 600 to 1200 AD
name: Middle Greek

definition: High German from 1100 to 1500
name: Middle High German

definition: Irish Gaelic from 1100 to 1500
name: Middle Irish

definition: Low German from 1100 to 1500
name: Middle Low German

definition: branch of the maxillary artery; its branches supply meninges
name: middle meningeal artery

definition: a name between your first name and your surname
name: middle name

definition: a person who takes a position in the political center
name: middle of the roader

definition: the time period of Neanderthal man; ended about 35,000 years BC
name: Middle Paleolithic

definition: a school for students intermediate between elementary school and college; usually grades 9 to 12
name: middle school

definition: arises near the eye; joins the superficial temporal veins to form the retromandibular vein
name: middle temporal vein

definition: the term in a syllogism that is common to both premises and excluded from the conclusion
name: middle term
